price: (Nkͻmhyεni), wei yε ahuntasεm na Yεreyi ama woͻ. Na na wonka wͻn ho wͻ berε a (Yosef nuanom) nyaa wͻn ho nteaseε na wͻbͻͻ wͻn pͻ bͻne no.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيۡهِمۡ إِذۡ أَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَمۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika min anbāi al-ghaybi nūḥīhi ilayka wamā kunta ladayhim idh ajmaʿū amrahum wahum yamkurūna
